original_title: Dalagang Bukid nila Hermogenes Ilagan at Leon Ignacio
overview: A Tanghalang Filipino Production. Directed by Nonon Padilla. Written by Hermogenes Ilagan and Leon Ignacio, this is a fairy tale romance between Angelita, the mountain girl and her lover, Cipriano.
title: Dalagang Bukid nila Hermogenes Ilagan at Leon Ignacio
